subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Pacman Jones’s repeated run-ins with the law have made him an example for the N.F.L.’s new personal conduct policy. He will have a hearing with Commissioner Roger Goodell on April 3.
snippet: Pacman Jones’s repeated run-ins with the law have made him an example for the N.F.L.’s new personal conduct policy. He will have a hearing with Commissioner Roger Goodell on April 3.
